name: Foriegn Aid
description:
IMPORTANT - PLEASE GO INTO FULL SCREEN (BLUE BUTTON BOTTOM RIGHT) IDK HOW BUT I MESSED UP SCREEN VIEWPORT IF YOU KNOW HOW TO FIX PLS LET ME KNOW!

You are Leslie, an aspiring journalist fresh out of college. She's been wait for a fresh break that will get her page a lot of views. Luckily there was a recent earthquake at a primitive town. She thinks this will make content but does she really want to witness the true horrors of tragedies?
